product_name: Pachaug State Forest Trail Map - Connecticut
long_description: Slip this handy map into your pocket for hiking and biking adventures in Connecticut's Pachaug State Forest. Details topography, trails and roads. Durable map paper is waterproof and won't wear out at the folds. Measures 17.5 x 9.25 in. open, 4.5 x 3.5 in. folded. Copyright 2004, Cliff Vanover.
short_description: Slip this handy map into your pocket for hiking and biking adventures in Connecticut's Pachaug State Forest.
